channel.description: Recent content in CacheD on tech-lessons.in

item.title: Designing an in-memory LFU cache
item.description: I had been working on building an in-memory LFU cache (least frequently used cache) and now that it is done, I thought of writing about the building blocks of an LFU cache. This article shares the building blocks of an LFU cache along with the ideas from two research papers: TinyLFU and BP-Wrapper CacheD is the name of my cache, and it is inspired by Ristretto . I know CacheD is a very creative name.
